title: The Straight Path Convention 14 - 15 March 2020 - Assim al hakeem
transcript: we can never be strong again until we unite until we leave all our differences behind and put our GPS our compass to be the Quran and the Sunnah not individuals not a ruler or a scholar or a wealthy man or a diary our compass is the Quran and the Sunnah if they follow them if not we respect them but a much religion is more worthy of being followed be steadfast the straight path convention returns March 14th and 15th 2020 register now at WWE straight path calm dot my
